page.title: 05Manwood's School,Sandwich
page.content: Sir Roger Manwood's School is situated on the Deal side of Sandwich. Despite the school being on the outskirts of the town it is easily accessible. Most of the pupils live in Sandwich or Deal or in surrounding villages. A few live in Dover or Thanet. Most of the problems met are in travelling to and from school. Recently the school has had a new building added to create room for more pupils on the admission of girls. In the building there are new rooms for language studies, music, cooking and art. The school has good playing fields but unfortunatly, because Sandwich is in a marshy area the fields often become flooded. The school also takes boarders. Since the town offers few recreational facilities the school provides most.
